indicators.label: Legislation, laws, regulations, administrative requirements, policies or other government instruments in place are sufficient for implementation of IHR (2005)
The State can demonstrate that it has adjusted and aligned its domestic legislation, policies and administrative arrangements to enable compliance with IHR (2005)
A functional mechanism is esatablished for the coordination and integration of relevant sectors in the implementation of IHR
